Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2018 08:46PM Grandma62 wrote: I have been itching for some time now, 2 yrs post op double mastectomy. My surgeon said it's very common, but no recommendations. I lotion up every night, seems to help some. We just put up with it???
Posts.Title: Phantom Itching 2 years post reconstruction myhazeleyes coachvicky
